properties.areaDesc: Atlantic Waters of Puerto Rico AND USVI from 10 NM to 19.5N
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 5 at 4:31PM AST until January 7 at 8:00PM AST by NWS San Juan PR
properties.description:
...CHOPPY AND HAZARDOUS SEAS EXPECTED TO BEGIN LATE MONDAY NIGHT...

.A northwesterly swell will invade the local waters causing
hazardous seas starting late Monday night.

* WHAT...Seas 6 to 7 feet expected.

* WHERE...Atlantic Waters of Puerto Rico and USVI from 10 NM to
19.5N.

* WHEN...From 2 AM to 8 PM AST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 8 PM AST TUESDAY
